description:
### CountInversionsNaive

A function, countInversionsNaive, that takes an array of integers as an argument and returns the number of inversion pairs in the array. An inversion pair is a pair of indices (i, j) such that i < j and arr[i] > arr[j].

Input: An array of integers.
Output: The number of inversion pairs in the input array.

Example:

``` countInversionsNaive([1, 3, 2, 0]) // 4 ```
